query:
SELECT 
  violation_type,
  player_name,
  team_name,
  details,
  COUNT(*) as occurrence_count
FROM upgrade_violations
WHERE violation_type = 'PLAYER_NOT_FOUND'
GROUP BY player_name, team_name, details
ORDER BY occurrence_count DESC, player_name;
